message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $90. Can you consider it?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit high for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $95. Can you consider it?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $105. This is the best I can do.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $98. Can you consider it?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I can offer it to you for $102. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not comfortable with $102. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100. Can you consider it?
